biotools.summary: This repository contains code for classifying tensors using different tensor projection and classification methods. Currently the implementations only support matrix observations, There will also be code for simulating data to allow comparisons between the methods.

bioschemas.name: tensor_classification
bioschemas.summary: This repository contains code for classifying tensors using different tensor projection and classification methods. Currently the implementations only support matrix observations, There will also be code for simulating data to allow comparisons between the methods.
